description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5lvos","text":"ORF1 deletion is observed in some new SARS-CoV-2 lineages and is lineage defining for B.1.1.7 and P.1. Biological effect of this mutation is still unknown. Developed RT-PCR was tested on numerous samples of lineages B.1.1.7, B.1.351, P.1 (validated by sequencing) and samples without this mutation with no false-postive results.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c25k7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d08np","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"aj7dv","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4jvus","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"162EE4C051C211ECB80BB73EB6EC2F8A","height":31,"id":189012,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"orf1del oligos.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/f2uybkgn7.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/f2uwbkgn7.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/f2uxbkgn7.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/f2uvbkgn7.webp","width":550}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

{"blocks":[{"key":"30lcm","text":"Briefly vortex and centrifuge reagents before use.","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2s567","text":"Prepare the PCR reaction mixture following the specifications below:","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"46qp0","text":" ","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"hb7f","text":"     2X RT-PCR Buffer      12.5 μl            25X RT-PCR Enzyme Mix      1 μl            ORF1-del primers      600 nM each           ORF1-del probe      400 nM           RNA template      5 μl            Nuclease-free water      to 25 μl      ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":243}],"data":{}},{"key":"g39v","text":" ","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c7li7","text":"Use SARS-CoV-2 positive samples as the template. In the case of screening of unknown samples use multiplex RT-PCR with some oligonucleotides for detection SARS-CoV-2 as a control reaction. This primer set for SARS-CoV-2 detection can be added to the test without decrease of sensitivity of the ORF1 deletion test:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7vm1u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8btir","text":" {"blocks":[{"key":"b3bi5","text":"Interprete the results: detection of fluorescence probe “ORF1-del-P” (Cy5 channel in our case) means presence of ORF deletion 11288–11296","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ai29g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"36tu4","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"33btu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"3C76BE00C31011EBA9FC8F352ADB003B","height":303,"id":189022,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"2.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/f2vabkgn7.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/f2u8bkgn7.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/f2u9bkgn7.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/f2u7bkgn7.webp","width":489}}}}
